This game is fantastic! So much fun to play either by yourself or with friends.

Игра затянула еще в самом начале ( в меню ),что могу отметить из плюсов:
1 Такой геймплей которого вы не видели ни в одной игре уж точно :)
2 Атмосфера ( просто нечего сказать кроме как отличная работа )
3 Графика даже я игрок который играет на средних в эту игру могу насладится графонием пополной :) 
4 Звук держит в напряжении 
Итак, после того как я перечислил все плюсы игры перейдем к минусам: 
1 Кривая оптимизация именно поэтому вынужден играть на средних :( 
2 Большой пинг еще ни разу пинг не был меньше 80 и это печально
3 Большой дизбаланс к примеру маньяк Легион просто может бегать на том же уровне что и вы просто убивает не за 2 удара, а за 4(вроде бы, но сути не меняет)
Ну вот и все, но что сподвигло меня вернуться и поиграть в эту игру то это пирамидоголовый( о да и это бомба)

great hit boxes and great ping would get moste likely yes :)

I originally played Dead By Daylight in 2016, returned to play back in 2019 and the improvement and expansion of this game is incredible, the devs from BHVR really care about this game and are constantly trying to the player base happy, be it from new content such as Killers/Survivors or maps, they balance the game a lot based of player feedback and stats they gather to make sure it is as fair as can be.

While this game is amazing and definitely worth picking up, it does have its issues, like any game, the major issues currently are the hitboxes, it seems almost 80/20 if you will or won't get hit by the Killer, usually you get hit regardless, this most also be a fault within the dedicated servers they only recently introduced and while it is better than having P2P which could be really bad, having stable ping is perfect but they seriously need to iron out the hit box issues.

Balancing in this game is done for the average players and not based on the top tier players, being Red Ranks myself I have no issues with a lot of the main issues average players have, it's typically a matter of skill rather than things being "broken" or "unbalanced", while I do feel as though certain aspects are broken such as Killer addons, a lot of them are being changed.

They are currently undergoing a new patch/chapter to which they will give bans to players who disconnect, this has been a long time coming and it was needed, to many games would be ruined because someone left early within the game for no apparent reason, this won't stop people ruining games however as they can easily run towards the killer and get killed on a hook if they wanted to leave, so in terms of ruining the game for the other players this only really affects the survivors now, the Killer will be able to do what they want even more so now, which they do anyway typically but there is some kind players out there.

Dead By Daylight does have a toxic player base, people talk smack and play horrible, but like any game it is what it is.

Overall, a great game to play with friends or to make friends on, very active community and constantly being pushed for content.

I can easily put this game in my top 10 of all time (since the 90's); that's how fun it is to play and spend time on. But there are certain issues that seems to have been around from the beginning and have never been solved which makes it frustrating to play.

- Connection issues (disconnects happen, not usually but they do happen)
- Long queue time to play killer (for me at least 15 minutes)
- No solution for players rage quitting (which happens often)
- This is not a game that is balanced like CS:GO, so prepare to have some moments that make you think "boy how OP can this character be"
- Developers keep making cosmetics and new characters while the issues that the game has had for a very long time are never addressed

I have a love and hate relationship with DBD, but it's mostly love.

UPDATE: I do not recommend this game anymore. If your goal is to play killer, then this game is for you, but if you plan to play survivor, you will be frustrated. The developers keep buffing killers with every update while nerfing survivors. All in all, if you like playing survivor, do not get into this game.

This game is on my PLaylist for quite some time now, but i still love playing it! Thrilling Gameplay and new Content make this game interesting and fun to play. There is a decent variety of both Killers and Survivors, as well as a big pool of different Perks, wich let you create fun combos, or serious threads. 
Only two negative points that i got to find about the game is the DLC- System, where you have to buy DLC's to get to play new Killers/Survivors, even tho there is a ingame shop for skins and stuff, and the Servers, wich have issues since day 1!

I would highly recommend the game tho, so get it and see you inside the Horrors!
